page.title: 18GOSFORTH, CUMBRIA,EVENTS.con
page.content: This is but one event in a busy year. The Amateur Dramatic Group put on a production at Christmas & two others through the year.There are also visits from Professional Touring Companies. The Young Farmers meet regularly as do the Women's Institute,the Mother's Union, from the Church of England and the Women's Circle from the Methodists There are often sales of Work, to raise funds, both by these groups and by various interested villagers, wishing to raise funds for their pet Charities,such as Oxfam,R.S.P.C.C.etc. The Rotory Club now hold an Annual Fete in August and sing Carols at Christmas to raise money for local Charities. There is a thriving Art Club meeting weekly and holding its Annual Exhibition in the Summer.
